pullRequest.title: Null check and logging for plugin execution
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
This change adds a null check to the graph parameter and in the case of run later, stops execution and logs the null graph error.
The change also includes a null check to runNow methods to log when the graph which is passed in is null.

Alternate Designs
Catch failing silently - Unsure where this was meant to be occurring.

Why Should This Be In Core?
Additional logging

Benefits
Additional logging

Possible Drawbacks

Verification Process

Applicable Issues

commit.message: add null check and log messages for plugins

nodes.bodyText:
getting super picky here but I think NetBeans provides an optimisation here to convert the string concatenation with a message template
LOGGER.log(Level.WARNING, "{0} plugin was executed on a graph which was null", plugin.getName());
